oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Mode of getting rid of the evil influence of bad dreams. In the Katkop dialect, by Dia!kwain (L V.-15. 5160 rev.-5163 rev.). What Dia!kwain's mother did when she wished to get rid of the evil influence of bad dreams.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: How to get rid of the evil influence of bad dreams
